Subject: LN2 Fantasy and Science Fiction Ice Cream
Description: Liquid nitrogen 'ice cream' featuring flavors found in your favorite Fantasy and Science Fiction Universes: Butterbeer, Pangalactic Gargleblaster, and Sonic Screwdriver. These flavors all include alcohol - 21+ only.  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie, Ariel Landrau, Jen Hamilton - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: LN2 Improvisational Ice Cream
Description: Liquid nitrogen 'ice cream' made with flavors we have on hand! Feeling creative? Speak up and we'll see what we can do!  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie, Ariel Landrau, Jen Hamilton - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: LN2 Inclusive Ice Cream
Description: Liquid nitrogen 'ice cream' made with dairy and/or sugar alternatives (soda slushies, soy milk, coconut milk, agave nectar, stevia). Alternative ingredients also available at other LN2 sessions, just ask!  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie, Ariel Landrau, Jen Hamilton - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: LN2 Sunday Brunch Ice Cream
Description: Ice cream made with liquid nitrogen, for a Sunday brunch! Flavors will include egg custard, orange, coffee, and cheesecake with a variety of toppings. Alternative ingredients available; we can make some non-dairy or sugar-free!  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie, Ariel Landrau, Jen Hamilton - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: LN2 Volunteer Training
Description: Come learn how to make LN2 Ice Cream so you can volunteer to help!  Speakers include:Sarah Elkins, Phil Salkie, Ariel Landrau, Jen Hamilton - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
